attributes.action: Freeze Council Tax during self isolation,
attributes.additional_details: Government needs to act upon household utilitys and Council Tax freeze, self employed people cannot afford to self isolate, neither can the elderly and persons on minimum wage
attributes.background: During self isolation for the elderly and anyone who is sick ahould have Council Tax fozen. Sick pay of £95 a week is not realistic to cover the needs requires to self isolate, the Government needs to act on this

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
